Ingredients per Wagashi:
* 25 grams white bean paste (about 6.5 tbsp)
* 1.25 g shiratamako (about 1.2 tsp)
* 2.5 g water (about 2.5 tsp)
* 15 g red bean paste (4 tbsp)
* gel food coloring

Ingredients per cake: Cake roll:
* Egg white: 80g
* Egg yolk: 50g
* Sugar: 35g (egg white) + 10g (egg yolk)
* Cake flour: 20g
* Cocoa powder: 4g
* Butter: 20g
* Whipped cream: 75g
* Sugar for whipped cream: 10g

Tree root coating:
* Dark chocolate: 40g
* Whipped cream: 40g

Ingredients per chocolate mochi:
*Chocolate filling:
* Light cream: 8g
* Dark chocolate: 8g
* Light cream: 35g
* White sugar: 8g

Glutinous rice wrapper:
* Glutinous rice flour: 16g
* Corn starch: 5g
* Cane sugar: 5g
* Milk: 30g
* Cocoa powder: 1.5g
* Butter (add after steaming): 3g
